richText.text: The response [to Yarno] has been really positive. I would say the majority of people within our company, like people in other companies, want to develop as professionals. But at the same time, they don't want to be weighed down with something that's going to take them away from their everyday roles. The good thing about Yarno is that we've been able to incorporate professional learning into their routines...and that's been received really positively.

primary.quote_title: Group Learning Manager at Grant Broadcasters
